title: Lakes Entrance Fishing

abstract: A family engaged with the spiritual and commercial endeavour that is fishing. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from East Gippsland'.
description: A story about a fishing family and the importance of the fishing industry within the town of Lakes Entrance. Arthur Allen and his family have maintained a tradition of lake fishing in East Gippsland for five generations and hope to continue for many years to come. Despite the uncertainty of the industry, Arthur, his son Matthew and the Lakes Entrance Fishermen's Co-op, strive to keep fishing alive in Lakes Entrance.
